item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I am Shashank Sharma. This is me in short:

  • I do research about problem and build solutions for them.
  • Currently working as a Research Engineer at TCS Research, Kolkata; on the abstraction of different neuromorphic architectures for sensing and visual computing domains.

Research Interests

  • Perspective-aware summarization in healthcare NLP
  • Efficient LLM adaptation (Adapters, LoRA)
  • Controlled generation with classifier-guided training
  • Neuromorphic computing and brain-inspired learning

Contact
